item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Project Sid: Many-agent simulations toward AI civilization (163 points | 41 comments)
2. Why systemd is a problem for embedded Linux (57 points | 36 comments)
3. HardenedBSD Feature Comparison with OpenBSD, FreeBSD, NetBSD (10 points | discuss)
4. Bill Atkinson doxxed Douglas Adams in 1987 (42 points | 19 comments)
5. Hacker News Data Map [180MB] (58 points | 15 comments)
6. Show HN: Tinder, but to Decide What to Eat (29 points | 13 comments)
7. Touchscreens are out, and tactile controls are back (663 points | 508 comments)
8. pg_flo – Stream, transform, and re-route PostgreSQL data in real-time (94 points | 14 comments)
9. gptel: a simple LLM client for Emacs (52 points | 9 comments)
10. Programming Languages That Blew My Mind (2023) (121 points | 52 comments)
11. ToolGit: A collection of scripts that extend Git with various sub-commands (58 points | 38 comments)
12. Do you need Redis? PostgreSQL does queuing, locking, and pub/sub (37 points | 17 comments)
13. The Submerged Nabataean Temple in Puteoli at Pozzuoli, Italy (13 points | 5 comments)
14. Show HN: Replacicon – Create and customize app icons on macOS (19 points | 6 comments)
15. Moving Off Heroku, Slowly (43 points | 22 comments)
16. Missing open-source contributor presents a dilemma when accepting their PR (38 points | 29 comments)
17. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) Is Hiring Back End and Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
18. Create block devices on your computer backed by Redstone Memory (140 points | 29 comments)
19. PacCam: Pac-Man controlled with your face (7 points | discuss)
20. Redox OS gets RISC-V support (44 points | 3 comments)
21. A React Renderer for Gnome JavaScript (101 points | 46 comments)
22. Unix core utilities implemented in Haskell (180 points | 70 comments)
23. Mirrord Mirrord on the wall, who's most processed of them all (7 points | 1 comment)
24. Top discoveries about ancient people from DNA in 2023 (21 points | 1 comment)
25. Speed, scale and reliability: 25 years of Google datacenter networking evolution (240 points | 58 comments)
26. Programming NetBIOS on OS/2 (33 points | discuss)
27. Future Music magazine is closing after 32 years (38 points | 14 comments)
28. Get me out of data hell (584 points | 246 comments)
29. Turn your phone or tablet into a chess clock (31 points | 29 comments)
30. The motor turns too much (366 points | 171 comments)
